/>
Introduction
This topic contains information about the rules that apply to various elections between FEC and VA benefits, including
how OWCP determines eligibility for FEC
, and
elections involving
increases in VA compensation
a combined disability rating
FEC and VA benefits
based on military service
for a reservist’s disability or death
, and
based on civilian employment
the discontinuance of FEC
a surviving spouse with a child
, and
children or parents
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 5 - Federal Employees’ Compensation (FEC)
citation: Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section None
